mapper.update: update friends set status = '4' where (user_id = dto.userId and friend_id = dto.friendId) or (user_id = dto.friendId and friend_id = dto.userId)
mapper.select: select u.id AS "user.id", u.username AS "user.username", u.password AS "user.pqssword", u.name AS "user.name", u.avatar_url AS "user.avatarUrl", u.birthday AS "user.birthday", u.signature AS "user.signature", u.phone AS "user.phone", u.email AS "user.email", u.status AS "user.status", u.last_login_time AS "user.lastLoginTime", u.create_time AS "user.createTime", f.id AS "id", f.status AS"status", f.create_time AS "createTime", f.update_time AS "updateTime", f.append_msg AS "appendMsg", f.friend_remark_name AS "friendRemarkName" from friends f,user u where f.status = 1 and u.id = ( select friend_id from friends where user_id = #{userId}) or u.id = ( select user_id from friends where friend_id = #{userId})
